page.title: 04A day in the life of Marion.
page.content: I usually wake up at 7:00 am. After getting up I wash, dress, make my bed and get my things ready for school. I then have breakfast and practise music until it is time to leave for school. I walk to school which starts at 9:00. Morning lessons usually consist of Maths or English with a 15 minute break at 10:45. After lunch, which is from 12:30-1:30 we might have Art, Singing, Computer, Topic, History or Welsh. School finishes at 3:30. After arriving home I change into my tracksuit and visit the Sports-hall where I do gymnastics. Later, I go home and wash, have some tea and either use the home computer or watch television. I go to bed at 9:45 pm.
